game.name: CEO Sim: Cyberpunk
game.shortDescription: CEO Sim: Cyberpunk is an economic strategy about corporation management in the world of cyberpunk. Become the CEO of Virtual Dreams company and, under the control of the board of directors, try to maintain your power in the face of a brewing corporational war.
game.shortDescriptionEn: CEO Sim: Cyberpunk is an economic strategy about corporation management in the world of cyberpunk. Become the CEO of Virtual Dreams company and, under the control of the board of directors, try to maintain your power in the face of a brewing corporational war.
